name: generate-unique-name
info:
Input arguments:
generate-unique-name-input.index-table-name - name of INDEX table
generate-unique-name-input.index-table-prefix-column - name of prefix column in above table
generate-unique-name-input.name-table-name - name of table holding all generated names
generate-unique-name-input.index-length - non-null digit if index should be fixed length

Output arguments:
generate-unique-name-output.generated-name - generated name (null if error)
generate-unique-name-output.error-message - error message (non-null if error)

name: for idx from current index to list-end
First check from the current index to the max index
check if we've used this name before
return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
    <parameter name="generate-unique-name-output.error-message" value="Failed insert into GENERIC_RESOURCE_NAME table" />

name: for idx from 1 to current index
Wrapping around - now check from 1 to the original index
check if we've used this name before
if db name is null we found an index we can use
return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
    <parameter name="generate-unique-name-output.error-message" value="`'Failed to insert record into ' + $generate-unique-name-input.index-table-name + ' table'`" />

name: return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
    <parameter name="generate-unique-name-output.error-message" value="Failed insert into GENERIC_RESOURCE_NAME table" />

name: return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
    <parameter name="generate-unique-name-output.error-message" value="We have exhausted the naming index count" />

name: if we get here when there is no index length, then we have used up all 1000
return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
    <parameter name="generate-unique-name-output.error-message" value="We have exhausted the naming index count" />

name: set sql statement
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='tmp.gun.sql' value="`'SELECT * from GENERIC_RESOURCE_NAME WHERE type = $generate-unique-name-input.name-table-type'
+ ' AND name = $generate-unique-name-input.supplied-name'`" />

name: return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
<parameter name='generate-unique-name-output.error-message' value="`'The name ' + $generate-unique-name-input.supplied-name + ' has already been used'`" />

name: Caller supplied name - make sure it's not already used
return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
<parameter name="generate-unique-name-output.error-message" value="Failed insert into GENERIC_RESOURCE_NAME table" />

name: set sql statement
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='tmp.gun.sql' value="`'insert into GENERIC_RESOURCE_NAME values ( '
+ ' $generate-unique-name-input.name-table-type , $generate-unique-name-input.supplied-name , null , null, null )'`" />

name: set sql statement
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='tmp.gun.sql' value="`'SELECT * from GENERIC_RESOURCE_NAME WHERE type = $generate-unique-name-input.name-table-type'
+ ' AND name = $tmp.gun.generated-name'`" />

name: return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
    <parameter name="generate-unique-name-output.error-message" value="`'Failed to insert record into ' + $generate-unique-name-input.index-table-name + ' table'`" />

name: set sql statement
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='tmp.gun.sql' value="`'SELECT * from GENERIC_RESOURCE_NAME WHERE type = $generate-unique-name-input.name-table-type'
+ ' AND name = $tmp.gun.generated-name'`" />

name: set sql statement
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='tmp.gun.sql' value="`'SELECT * from GENERIC_RESOURCE_NAME WHERE type = $generate-unique-name-input.name-table-type'
+ ' AND name = $tmp.gun.generated-name'`" />

name: return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
    <parameter name="generate-unique-name-output.error-message" value="naming exhausted for input with index-length = 0" />

name: Change History
info:
iTrack 10767
- insert new column (index, prefix, info)
iTrack 11252
- use tmp.gun.index-string as opposed to tmp.gun.idx as prefix for GENERIC_RESOURCE_NAME insert
